article.headline: Holy Cross 71, Fordham 63 (2OT)
article.story: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) -- Torey Thomas scored 23 points to lead Holy Cross to a 71-63 win over Fordham in double overtime Sunday. Thomas scored all five of the Crusaders' points in the first overtime and eight of the team's 11 points in the second overtime. Holy Cross (3-4) trailed Fordham 55-50 with 15 seconds left in regulation before Colin Cunningham hit a 3-pointer and then, after a Rams turnover, scored on a layup with three seconds left to send the game to overtime. Bryant Dunston and Jermaine Anderson each scored 19 points to lead Fordham (1-6). Both players fouled out in overtime. Cunningham had 15 points and Keith Simmons scored 12 for Holy Cross.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
